page.title: 12VILLAGE SURVEY
page.content: From this section it is obvious that the shop is well supported by those who filled in the questionnaire. {93}% used the post office {90}% used the shop {81}% had papers. Similarly,{86}% used the butchers and {65}% used the White Hart. Ofthe delivery services,milk obviously attacted most with{84}%, the library came second at{24}.The following list shows number of regular customers, { { 18}ice cream { 15}hairdresser { 12}bread { 11}fish and chips { 7}coal man {2}window cleaner {2}laundry Meals on wheels were thought worthwile by{83}and{3}thought not
